articles.description: This Diwali, Suhana Khan wore two sarees - both gold, both stripe, both paired with heavily embellished strappy blouses. Even her earrings and her hairdo were the SAME!
articles.content: Both sarees had a similar stripe pattern. Suhana went with heavily embellished strappy blouses for both. Same hairdo, too. And, did we spot the SAME earrings?
